item.title: Alexis Bledel Narrates ’Tuck Everlasting’ Audiobook for 50th Anniversary Edition (Exclusive First Listen)
item.description: The actress starred in the 2002 film adaptation of the classic children’s book: “It has been an amazing experience to revisit this world.”
